name: Hijaiyah Dreamer
description:
The player will act as Fulan. A young man dreams of compiling hijaiyah letters that fly in the sky after being given advice by an ustadz while at the Senjanya Kopi cafe. There are 3 scenes in this game, namely day, afternoon, and night. This game is made for all ages and there is no age limit because this game is easy for players to understand.

Finding fun in this game is easy to play and understandable by players. Many challenges to increase the level and simple interface so that players can easily understand the game.

Hijaiyah Dreamer v0.1
